body.name: Super Retro Game Console, Classic Retro Game System Built-in 821 Games and 2 Controllers, HDMI Output, Plug and Play 8-Bit Vintage Entertainment System, Old-School Gaming System for Adults and Kids
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 12 hrs 55 mins
features: 【PRELOADED WITH 821 CLASSIC RETRO GAMES】The super classic retro game console with built in games includes 821 classic games. Just plug and play, No need to insert cards or download retro games. it collected a lot of last century all kinds of classic games. including action, sports, puzzle solving, fighting and racing etc super Classic Games recover your childrenhood memory.(A small number of games are duplicates and not in English)

【HDMI HD DISPLAY OUTPUT】This upgraded version of super retro mini game console has an HDMI HD output,Compatible with all modern TV and projector monitors with HDMI port. An HDMI cable is included. Via HDMI Connect allows you to easily enjoy lively and interesting video games on the big screen. (4.49 ft handle cable plus 4.92ft HDMI cable)

【PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFTS】Give this mini super retro gaming console as a gift to children to,allow your child to experience growing experiences and happiness, and enhance communication and feelings with children.It can also be used as a gift to a friend's child to,Share a taste of your happy childhood and,play the game together, laugh together,let the children experience the growth of their parents.

【HEALTH STANDARDS & SAFE DESIGN】Give this retro gaming console Conforms to health standards. Made of non-toxic, high-quality ABS materials.which is safe for adults and children. The mini game consoles has simple design,The game controller provides the user with a firm grip，perfectly fit in kids' hands,prevents the risk of damage and falling.
【CUSTOMER SERVICE】If you have any other questions about this custom super classic retro game console product before or after sales. Please feel free to contact us, We're here to assist you promptly!
body.description: Important Notes:X and Y buttons on the handle are for Backing to the previous level of selection.A, B and START buttons are equal to an OK button for confirmation so that you'll go to the next level of selection.In a game list interface, you can use the Right/Left arrow buttons to go forward/back 1 page so that you can select games quickly; You can use START, A, or B to confirm your game selection; X or Y to back to the upper level.Note that:1. This is an 8-bit retro game console, You cannot save the game progress. You can pause the game using Start.2. Only the left handle can control the system and game options. The right handle can only control the movements of the 2nd character in 2-players mode and it can NOT be used to control system options.3. After selecting a game, if you want to change to another game, press RESET. 4. that some games are repeated and are NOT in English. The number of nonrepetitive games is about 600.Gifts Package Includes:1 * Classic Mini Retro Game Console2 * Classic Mini Game Controllers1 * HDMI Cable1 * AC Adapter1 * Games List1 * User Manual

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NOT 620 DIFFERENT GAMES
reviews.reviewText: Yes the game holds 620 games but it does not say most of them are duplicates. I started counting how many actual games are on here but I lost count. Some of the games have 3 copies! I would have gave negative stars if allowed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just like the old Nintendo
reviews.reviewText: Has 620 games just like the original nintendo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Review for Retro Game Console, Classic Mini Retro Game System Built-in 620 Games If you're looking for NES stuff only this isn't for you....BUT...it does have a few of the good ones. There are lots of games I haven't even seen yet. The controllers are decent and the kit includes everything to connect to RCA. It seems well built and the family is really enjoying it. It's not perfect, but nothing is. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was excited to get this item, however when i pluged it in it did not work at all. All i could get from it was a green screen. Didnt even play 1 game.

reviews.reviewerName: It was just like they said now I can play on my tvs
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was anout to take it back until I fount a real Nintendo Mario game

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Cute little unit. Mario games are all Japanese or Chinese lol. Tried donkey kong you can't jump while running. Definitely old school but cute

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Within a few days the rubber insulation on the wires started to break down. After 2 weeks it barely works.
